member.name: T:Extenso.Data.QueryBuilder.ComparisonOperator
member.summary: Represents comparison operators for WHERE, HAVING and JOIN clauses

member.summary: Represents a JOIN clause to be used with SELECT statements

member.name: T:Extenso.Data.QueryBuilder.LogicOperator
member.summary: Represents logic operators for chaining WHERE and HAVING clauses together in a statement

member.summary: Represents a ORDER BY clause to be used with SELECT statements
